title: How to fill form 2 of the NTSE scholarship claim bill - Quora

response.answer_text: NTSE Claim Bill form is to be submitted by NTSE Scholars in order to avail scholarship, every year.The form is nowadays completely online and is to be submitted at this siteThe Copy of the form that you have to print, fill and scan back is here[1]  1.Login here with your NTSE Stage 2 roll no. and the password sent to you by post. 2.(only while filling the form the first time) Click on 'Acceptance Performa' and check the box that appears and click on submit.3.Click on Principal Certification.Upload the scanned copy of the FORM 2 duly filled and attested and fill the details on the page.4.Similarly fill the Form 3 and Form 4 and Upload their respective scanned copies5.Submit the complete claim bill and keep checking it regularly for updates made by the NTSE Cell. You generally have to fill it during/before december for the present academic year. Important Note : Those filling the claim bill form the second time or later, the form 1 and 2 links will be disabled for you. You dont have to fill the form 1 again anyway, but you have to fill the form 2 again. In order to do so, after filling form 3, 4 of the claim bill, select the edit option and then go and continue with form 2. Footnotes[1] https://www.google.co.in/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=http://www.ncert.nic.in/programmes/talent_exam/pdf_files/NTSE%2520Form1to4.pdf&ved=0ahUKEwj-qdLQ08rWAhWMOI8KHWu_DxUQFggyMAA&usg=AFQjCNFrkYRw19PLzK_JRTbw-lhNALPbKA

Even I am filling the form this year. I’ll explain step by step:- This is to certify that…..Your nameSon/Daughter of…… Father's NameIs a bonafide student of….. your class(XI if first time, and so on)In….. School nameand was admitted to this class on……. The date of your admission to current classHis her character is……. remarks by head of institution. (or they may ask you to fill it yourself, as in my case)….. write here if you are getting any other scholarshipYour school principal’s stamp and signatureDate

If I am correct this is the certificate from the principal. Print the form. Fill in the details of your name, parent’s name, current school/college, date of admission to the current institution and that you are not getting any other scholarship. Let school fill in the character part. Get it signed by the head of the institution with the seal and upload it along with the other forms. Every time you join a new institution you have to submit this form with the above details.
